instructions: Add the missing white line between the yellow and grey rectangles:  Insert `fill('#FFFFFF'); rect(0, 211, 174, 4);` after drawing the yellow rectangle and before the grey one.  Adjust the grey rectangle's y-coordinate to account for this new line.

Adjust the thickness of the red line: Change `rect(174, 263, 87, 1);` to `rect(174, 263, 87, 4);` to match the thickness of the white dividing line. Adjust the black rectangle's starting y-position to be below the new red line's position.
Extend the white rectangle:  Change `rect(174, 0, 87, 263);` to  `rect(174, 0, 87, 267);`. This will extend the white rectangle down to meet the adjusted red line.
